verbose_text: Various modifications in MS basal medium- i) reducing sucrose content from 30 to 20 g L -1; (ii) excluding MS vitamins and including B5 vitamins; (iii) reducing basal strength to half (1/2-MS); (iv) reducing basal strength to one-fourth (1/4-MS) were tried for optimal hairy root production.
evidence: MS basal medium- i) reducing sucrose
